nodes.text: The Great Kimogila's Skeleton was the name given by the inhabitants of Lok to the imposing skeleton of a massive kimogila. The final resting place of the creature was known as a notable point of interests of the planet Lok. Around 1 ABY, a spacer working with the Trandoshan bounty hunters Bossk and Balfur Jhcor killed the wanted Gungan Oono Mor'in near the Great Kimogila's Skeleton.

The Great Kimogila's Skeleton was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
